entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
